articles.title: Mahindra Auto sells 40,022 SUVs, a 23% growth and total volumes of 69,397,marks 11% growth in June 2024 - indiablooms
articles.description: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. (M&M Ltd.), an Indian automotive major, on Monday announced that its overall auto sales for the month of June 2024 stood at 69,397 vehicles, a growth of 11%, including exports.
